title: Are there any questions?
creator_credit: James Parker, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: A recruiting film, filmed on location at the RAAF Base, Amberley, Queensland, promoting the role of the RAAF Shows the air force as a worthwhile employer of people in an extremely wide range of occupations, ranging from the unskilled to the highly technical.
